tuv.seg: The Health Service Executive (HSE) may make arrangements for the boarding out of dependent people in a private house and for payment for all or part of the costs. The Boarding Out Scheme is not available in all areas
D'fhéadfadh Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) socruithe a dhéanamh i gcomhair lóistín sheachtrach do dhaoine cleithiúnacha i dteach príobháideach agus íoc as an gcostas iomlán, nó cuid de
The HSE must satisfy itself that the house is suitable for the person to be boarded out and that the householder is a fit person to look after the person in question

Caithfidh Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) a bheith sásta go bhfuil an teach feiliúnach don duine a bheidh ina lóistóir seachtrach agus gur duine stuama é/í an sealbhóir tí, chun breathnú amach don duine atá i gceist
The householder must provide suitable and sufficient care, nutritious and varied food, and adequate attendance, having regard to the needs of the person
Caithfidh an sealbhóir tí cúram feiliúnach agus dóthaineach a chur ar fáil, bia cothaitheach agus éagsúil agus freastal atá oiriúnach, ag tógáil san áireamh riachtanais an duine
He or she must also respect the privacy of the person boarded out
Caithfidh sé/í ómós a thabhairt do phríobháideachas an duine atá ar lóistín seachtrach
Not more than six people can be boarded out in one house
Ní féidir le níos mó ná seisear a bheith ar lóistín seachtrach in aon teach amháin
Regulations set out standards as to accommodation, cleanliness, safety and other related matters
Leagann na Rialacháin síos caighdeáin maidir le cóiríocht, glaineacht, sabháilteacht agus aon ní eile a bhaineann leis
The HSE pays the householder an amount of not more than half the weekly rate of State Pension (non-contributory) payable at the time
Íocann an FSS suim leis an sealbhóir tí, nach bhfuil níos mó ná leath an ráta sheachtainiúil don phinsean sean aoise (neamhranníocach), atá dhá íoc ag an am
In addition, the person boarded out must pay an amount as agreed with the HSE and the householder
Ina theannta sin, caithfidh an duine atá ar lóistín seachtrach suim a íoc atá aontaithe leis an FSS agus leis an sealbhóir tí

A person boarded out (or somebody acting on his or her behalf) may make a complaint to the Local Health Office in relation to any matter concerning the residence or the maintenance, care and welfare of the person

Is féidir le duine atá ar lóistín seachtrach (nó duine éigin atá ag feidhmiú thar a c(h)eann), gearán a dhéanamh leis an Oifig Sláinte Áitiúil, maidir le aon rud a bhaineann leis an áras nó le cothabháil, cúram agus leas an duine
